settings.heading: Cockpit USA
settings.subheading: Preserving American history through our garments since 1975.

settings.heading: The Suede Trucker
settings.subheading: Featured on Style Icon Eric Rutherford.

settings.heading: The Suede Shop
settings.subheading: Tell your brand's story through images

settings.pio_subheading: Our iconic designs immortalized in television & movies throughout cinematic history.

settings.rt_text: Cockpit USA featured on some of today's unforgettable T.V. Shows and Movies.

settings.txt_text_1: 35 Years after being featured in Steven Spielberg’s Amazing Stories Episode “The Mission” Cockpit USA once again has joined the Amazing Stories Universe. Cockpit USA is featured in this month’s Episode 5 “The Rift” of AppleTV+’s latest iteration of the Amazing Stories series on actor Austin Stowell who plays a heroic WWII Flying Tiger Pilot. We won’t give away the plot, but actor Austin Stowell wears the Cockpit USA “40th Anniversary” A-2 that was custom painted, styled, and distressed by our Cockpit USA in house team of Artists for the production. Be sure to watch Amazing Stories on AppleTV+ and you can check out the look here at Cockpit USA.
settings.txt_text_2: Actor Enrique Murciano wears Cockpit USA in NBC's The Black List.
settings.txt_text_3: The Cockpit USA lambskin G-1 jacket worn by actor Ross Lynch who plays Harvey Kinkle in Netflix's Sabrina (Seasons 1-3)

settings.rt_text: Our favorite actors and musicians wearing Cockpit USA
Inspired by those who make history, the movie heroes collection is a capsule of styles that are as recognizable as the heroes who have worn them.

settings.title: Heritage Collection
settings.text: Born from a passion for history and inspired by the iconic styles that have defined our heroes. Finely crafted tributes to the aviators, sailors, and soldiers who wore these classic garments with each one having a story that preserves their legacy through timeless style.

settings.heading: Image with text overlay
settings.subheading: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select imagery and text that relates to your style and story.

settings.pio_subheading: Suppling the U.S. Government and additional military personnel since the 1980's.

settings.rt_text: Cockpit USA items made to military specifications.
